description: Vocabulary from 'The Kodansha Kanji Learners Course'

deck.question: ...に従って
deck.comment: in accordance with...; in proportion to...

deck.question: ...の為に
deck.comment: for the sake of...; so that...

deck.question: ○をつける
deck.comment: mark (an answer) with a circle mark; mark as correct
